Package com.atakmap.map.opengl

Interface GLTerrain

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    QuadTreeElevationTerrain
    @Deprecated
@DeprecatedApi(since="5.3",
               forRemoval=true,
               removeAt="5.6")
public interface GLTerrain
    Deprecated.
    use TerrainRenderService API
    Interface for controlling terrain loading for the renderer.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        void update​(GLMapView view)
        Deprecated.
        Initiates terrain fetch given the current view. This method should be invoked at the start of the render pump.
        Parameters:
        view - The current view

      • getTerrainVersion

        int getTerrainVersion()
        Deprecated.
        This will get the current version of the terrain information. This number can be used to tell if new terrain information is available. When the number is the same it is assumed that any elevation requests will always return the same value.
        Returns:
        The current terrain version

      • getElevation

        double getElevation​(GeoPoint g,
                    GLResolvable.State[] state)
        Deprecated.
        Retrieves the elevation value at the specified point.
        Parameters:
        g - The point
        state - If non-null, returns the status of the elevation value returned. Results should be interpreted as follows
        • GLResolvable.State.RESOLVING - The derived value (if any) was interpolated, but may be further refined
        • GLResolvable.State.RESOLVED - The derived value will not be refined further
        • GLResolvable.State.UNRESOLVABLE - The value cannot be computed for the specified location
        Returns:
        The elevation value, as meters HAE at the specified location or Double.NaN if the value is not available. The value returned by state should be evaluated to determine how the value should be treated or if this method should be invoked with the given point again in the future.

      • updateAltitude

        void updateAltitude​(GLOffscreenVertex vertex)
        Deprecated.
        This method will try to lookup the altitude/elevation for the vertex updating the properties when the altitude has been found which includes incrementing the version values
        Parameters:
        vertex - The vertex to update the altitude for

      • updateAltitude

        int updateAltitude​(GLOffscreenVertex[] vertices,
                   int amount)
        Deprecated.
        This method will try to lookup the altitude/elevation for the vertices in the array starting at index 0 and going up to but excluding the vertex at index amount. Each vertex processed will have its properties updated when the altitude has been found which includes incrementing the version values. A vertex will only be updated if the GLOffscreenVertex.geoVersion does not equal the GLOffscreenVertex.altVersion value
        Parameters:
        vertices - The array of the vertices to update the altitudes for
        amount - The amount of the vertices to update
        Returns:
        The current terrain version getTerrainVersion()

      • tryToFreeUnusedMemory

        void tryToFreeUnusedMemory()
        Deprecated.
        When called this will try to free any memory that is not being used. The goal of this method is to reduce the memory footprint of the class, but it is not guaranteed to free anything when the method is called.
